name: Road Snake
description:
CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to change directions

HOW TO PLAY:

It's classic snake with a twist! Each time you pick up a letter your tail grows longer by one! Each time you get a letter, you also get faster. Don't crash into your own tail or the wall or you lose. 

TWIST:

There are words at the top of the screen. Pick up the letters that are drop in order or you lose. Trying to pick up the wrong letter is as bad as crashing into the wall! 

FEEL THE NEED FOR SPEED!

Made for the ChainLetterJam.

Thanks to TheShelfman for nominating me
